original: 準備就緒後，董卓廢少帝為弘農王，將劉協推上大位。又鴆殺何太后，終於使董卓成為漢室真正的掌權者，擔任相國。
text: After getting ready, Dong Zhuo abolished Shao Di as the King of Hongnong and pushed Liu Xie to the throne. He also killed the Empress Dowager He, and finally made Dong Zhuo the real power holder of the Han Dynasty and served as the minister.
